item.title: Soundboard script
item.dc:creator: @aznrx aznrx
item.description:
@aznrx wrote:

funny little script i made
enjoy laughing at this one

copy into scar :
[scar]
{ = / ==== / ======================= }
{ /| /_\ }
{ / |ZN / \ X Created _ }
{ ================================== }
{ [ Copy to address bar ] }
{ www.ebaumsworld.com/cornholio.html }
{ ================================== }
{ [ Instructions ] }
{ : drag crosshair onto soundboard }
{ : turn speakers On, not too high }
{ : press Ctrl+Alt+R or whichever }
{ hotkeys you assigned for Run }
{ : laugh. }
{ ================================== }

program cornholio;
begin
clickmouse(77, 130,true)
wait(11000)
clickmouse(79, 100,true)
wait(5000)
clickmouse(477, 130,true)
wait(2000)
clickmouse(458, 191,true)
wait(8500)
clickmouse(487, 104,true)
wait(2000)
clickmouse(499, 340,true)
wait(3000)
clickmouse(394, 578,true)
wait(4000)
clickmouse(509, 460,true)
wait(3000)
clickmouse(497, 522,true)
wait(2500)
clickmouse(548, 371,true)
wait(15000)
clickmouse(94, 549,true)
wait(1000)
clickmouse(81, 489,true)
wait(1000)
clickmouse(67, 433,true)
wait(8500)
clickmouse(481, 249,true)
wait(3000)
clickmouse(73, 310,true)
wait(1500)
clickmouse(471, 220,true)
end.
[/scar]
